1.title: The Beginning

11.content:
Yugi walked down the street, with only the noise of the city to distract him from his search for the next Millenium Item. The Spirit continually sensed nearby Items, and pointed Yugi in the right direction.

Yugi suddenly came to an intersection, and the Spirit fell strangely quiet...
11.title: Yugi's Path

111.content:
Yugi followed the signal, until he found a hooded stranger, as tall as Joey, standing in the street. Around his neck was a golden Millenuem item, with a clock in the middle.

"Greetings, Yugi...I've come a long way to see you," said the sranger, showing he had a duel disk strapped to his wrist.

"Who are you?" asked Yugi.

The stranger's hood lifted enough for Yugi to barely make out the stranger's face.

"I can not tell you much, but my name is Alex," said the stranger. "I wish to duel with you to see if you truely are Yugi. This duel will be by Battle City Rules!"

Yugi merged minds with Yami Yugi, and turned into the taller pharoh.

"Alright! I accept your duel," said Yami Yugi, as the stranger gave him a dueling disk. "I'll start by playing Beta the Magnet Warrior (1700/1600) in attack mode!"

Yugi's rock creature appeared from the disk, ready for battle.

"Hmm...nice try. Let's see how he does against my ferious Cat Knight (1900/900)!" shouted Alex, before he played the monster on his disk.

"Cat Knight?! I never even heard of that monster!" thought Yami Yugi in shock.

A fierce-looking catmorph knight, drabbed in armor and holding a huge sword, appeared from the disk.

"Cat Knight! Attack with your Chivalry Blade!" shouted Alex, before Cat Knight charged and slashed Yugi's Beta, dropping his LPs to 3800. "I'll end my turn by laying one card face down,"

Yami Yugi looked at his hand, knowing he had nothing there that could defeat the Cat Knight, but he had something that could defend against it.

"I lay one monster face down and end my turn!" shouted Yami Yugi. "My Giant Soldier of Stone (1300/2000), which I put down, has a defense of 2000, while that Cat Knight of his only has an attack of 1900," thought Yami Yugi with a smile.

Alex drew his next card, and said, "I play my Golem Dragon (1500/1900) in attack mode,"

"Another mysterious monster! Where is he getting them?!" thought Yami Yugi, in shock.

"And next I activate my trap, Ultimate Offering! It allows me to make more summons by sacfricing 500 LPs for each time I do!" shouted Alex, flipping up his face down card. "Now I know you never sene beasts like my knight or dragon, but I'm sure you'll quickly reconize this beast! I sacrfice 500 of my LPs to call forth my powerful creature!"

After seeing Cat Knight and Golem Dragon vanish, Yami Yugi saw a familar looking monster appear, that made his heart filled with fear.

Yami Yugi managed to say, "No...it can't be! It's..."
111.title: Yami Yugi VS The Mysterious Alex

choices: Use the soul exchange, sacrificing your monster and Alex's Dark magician for
1111.content:
The Dark Magician appeared in a flash of light.

"It's your turn, Yugi..." Alex said, smirking in triumph.

Yugi stood in awe as his favorite monster stood before him.

"I must think quickly..." thought Yami.

Yami quickly drew his next card and gasped, as he held his own Dark Magician in his hand. He skimmed through his hand and came across the card Soul Exchange.

"Hmm..." Yami thought. "Maybe I should..."
1111.title: Irony

choices: Mavolent Nuzzler! Raises Alex's Dark Magican's attack to 3200!
Tribute to the Doomed! Destroys Yugi's Dark Magician!
11111.content:
"I play Soul Exchange! This card will allow me to sacrifice both my face down monster and your Dark Magician for my Dark Magician!" smiled Yugi, before both Yugi's Soldier and Alex's Dark Magician vanished, for Yugi's Dark Magician.

"He, he. Soul Exchange may allow you to do so, but it ends your turn. It gives me plenty of enough time to recover," smirked Alex.

"Uh-oh...he's got something up. He's good, someone skilled must have taught him Duel Monsters," gulped Yugi.

Alex continued smirking, as he said, "I play one card face down, and play Monster Reborn to bring back my Dark Magician!"

Alex's Dark Magician appeared, before Alex played his Vorse Raider (1900/1000) in attack mode as well.

"I don't have worries about your Dark Magician...because he's a goner once I play this!" smirked Alex, before he slammed down his magic card, which was...
11111.title: Alex's Dark Magician Rises From the Grave

111111.content:
Alex smirked as he played the Mavolent Nuzzler card. "My Dark Magician is now the strongest monster on the field." Alex said, he pointed up " What is left of you, I dunno, but this duel is over." Alex pointed as Dark Magician attacked Yugi's leaving him stranded with no cards left on the field. "Damn." Yugi said under his breath.

Yugi smiled like he normally did against enemies that he stood nearly no chance against, "Its not over UNTIL I have NO more life points." Yugi said, Alex smirked as he attacked Yugi with Vorse Raider, Yugi slumped and took the next card which was.....
111111.title: Mavolent Nuzzler! Raises Alex's Dark Magica...

111112.content:
"I play Tribute to the Doomed!" Alex sneered.
"And I'll destroy your Dark Magician!"

Yugi watched helplessly as his Dark Magician was swept off to the graveyard.

Alex laughed. "Your most powerful card, destroyed. Poor Dark Magician..."

"Stop taunting me, Alex!" Yugi yelled. "If you're going to attack, then do so!"

"Fine by me, Yugi..." Alex said. "Dark Magician, attack Yugi's Life Points directly!!"

Yugi quickly shuffled through his hand, looking for something to protect his LP. He found...
111112.title: Oh crap...

choices: Summon 2 more Blue Eyes and sacrafie them to summon...
1111121.content: Yami Says, "I'll play Kuriboh (300/200) In defense mode, Plus I'll use Mutiply to cover the feild with Kuriboh". Alex says, "Oh yeah, I sacrafice my monsters to summon the Bule Eyes White Dragon (3000/2500) in attack mode! Blue Eyes, TIME TO DESTROY THEM." The Blue eyes attacks but the Kuriboh are still there. Then Alex will...
1111121.title: Kuriboh vs Blue Eyes

11111211.content: Alex says, "Now I play two more Blue Eyes White Dragons." Yami Gasps. "And now," Alex continues, "I'll use Polymerization to fuse my 3 Blue Eyes to summon, THE ALMIGHtY BLUE EYES ULTIMATE DRAGON (4500/3000) IN ATTACK MODE!" "That's good Alex," says Yami, "But not good enough, I'll sacrifice the Kuriboh, Beta, and your Dark Magican to summon, SLIFER THE SKY DRAGON (X000/X000). I hold 6 cards so Slifer gains 6000 attack and defense ponits (6000/6000). Slifer, attack Blue Eyes Ultimate Dragon!" Slifer destroys the Ultimate Dragon. "Now," Yami continued. "Attack his life points directly!" "Meep...." Alex says as Slifer attacks him and he disappers into the Shadowrealm.
11111211.title: Slyther Attacks

1111122.content:
"AHHHH!!!" screamed Yugi, as his LPs plummeted from Dark Magician's attack.

"Now Vorse Raider! Attack Yugi directly too!" ordered Alex directly too, before his man-hunter charged and slashed Yugi, dropping his LPs even further.

Yugi looked at his hand, and said, "Hmm...not much I can do...wait! His Ultimate Offering card! I can use it against him!" He then played his Gazelle monster, and used the trap card to summon his Dark Magician Girl. "Thanks to the Dark Magicians, Dark Magician Girl can destroy your Dark Magician! GO!!!"

Dark Magician Girl fired her energy blast, vaporizing Alex's Dark Magician and a couple of his LPs.

"Yugi...this is bad. I know the Millenuem item around his neck...it is the Millenuem Clock. It grants it owner the power of time travel!!!" shouted Yami Yugi.

"You mean Alex may be from any time period?!!!" shouted Yugi.

Alex grinned, "As much I admired you Yugi, I still must win...so I'll use Ultimate Offering again to summon both my Uniclops (1800/1700) and Warrior of Ure Naid! (1700/1600)," His two monsters appeared next to Vorse Raider.

"None of his monsters have much as strength as my Dark Magician Girl...so he must have something sneaky planned," thought Yugi.

"Now I'll use Ultimate Offering to sacfrice all three of them for my great beast!!!" laughed Alex, as storm clouds appeared.

"NO!!! This means he has an Egyptian god card!!!" shouted Yugi, as an enormous monster appeared...
1111122.title: Danger Is Growing...

11111222.content:
"THIS CAN'T BE!!!" shouted Yugi, as the collosal blue giant known as Obelisk emerged from the ground.

"Obelisk the Tormentor! Crush the Dark Magician Girl! FIST OF FATE!!!" shouted Alex, before Obelisk reared back his massive fist. The Egyptian god smashed Yugi's Dark Magician Girl into nothing, dropping Yugi's LPs to 0.

"How is it...that you have Obelisk? Did you steal it from Kaiba?!" shouted Yugi, after he fell to his knees from the shock, as the monsters vanished.

"No...as of now, Seto Kaiba still has his Obelisk card," said Alex. "However, his and mine are one in the same. Yugi...I have come to give you a warning..."
11111222.title: Game Over

112.content: You see a mysterious person in the center of the street. You ask him what he's doing there so he ignores you. You turn to go a different way, but he yells to you from behind "Pull out your deck and duel me!"
112.title: The Mystery Man

choices: Play the Curse of Dragon card, and attack the horseman.
Play it safe, and put the Mystical Elf in defense mode with a magic card.
1121.content:
The mysterious man reveals his arm, he's holding a portable game mat with holographic projectors. The other one flies off of his arm and attaches to your arm. The Millenium Puzzle activates and Yami emerges as the master duelist we all know he is.

"The rules for this duel are 2000 Life Points, no tributes," the mysterious duelist announces. "I'll take the liberty of starting this duel by playing the Mystic Horseman in defense mode, and this magic card, face down!"

You've barely drawn your hand, and this creep's already played an impressive first card! If you don't act quickly enough, you'll be crushed into oblivion! Luckily for you, you have an impressive starting hand. You don't have your incredible Dark Magician, but you do have the Curse of Dragon card, the Mystical Elf, and a variety of magic and trap cards. So...what's your first move, Yami Yugi?
1121.title: A Fast-Paced Duel Begins!

choices: Mystery Man summons Blue Eyes White Dragon
Mystery Man plays one card in defense mode
11211.content: "I play the Curse of Dragon in attack mode," you declare in a commanding voice. "Now Curse of Dragon go, destroy his Mystic Horseman!" Your dragon fires a lethal blast from its mouth incinerating your opponent's monster and dropping his life points to 1100. "To finish off my turn, I will play a card face down." It's your move."
11211.title: Quick Lead

112111.content:
The Mystery Man pulls the top card from his deck and looks it over. "Prepare to meet your demise," he hollers, "I summon the legendary Blue Eyes White Dragon in attack mode!" *This can't be,* you hear Yami say, *only your grandpa and Kaiba own a Blue Eyes.*
"Go my Blue Eyes, destroy his Curse of Dragon.
"Not so fast," you say revealing your face down card, swords of revealing light. "This ought to give me enough time to think of a way to beat him."
"Think all you like," the man taunts, "you are just prolonging the inevitable."
"It's my move," you say. You draw a card.
112111.title: Blue Eyes?

1121112.content:
"Yes, this is just what I need," you say as you look at you Buster Blader card. It may only have an attack strength of 2600, but with its special ability it will be able to crush the Blue Eyes.
"I summon Buster Blader to the field in attack mode and place one card face down. Now Buster Blader attack and destroy the Blue Eyes."
Your warrior charges and slashes the Blue Eyes with its sword. For a moment both monsters are covered with a dark smoke.
"You are such a fool. My monster has a higher attack strength than yours."
"Look again," you tell him just as the smoke dissipates to reveal that the Buster Blader has triumphed over the Blue Eyes White Dragon. Your opponents life points are now at 1000.
1121112.title: Buster Blader

11211121.content:
Unflinching, your opponent draws his card. "My turn! I play Monster Reborn! I assume you know what it does..."

You frown. "I do."

As the crystal Anhk appeared on the Battlefield, the air swirls as the mighty Blue Eyes White Dragon is revived. "Now, attack, mighty Dragon! Burst Stream of Destruction!" The BEWD rears it's head back and builds up lighting within it's mouth.....but you aren't scared. After all, Rule Number One of Gaming: Always Act like you have the upper hand. And you have the upper hand.

"Not so fast!" You yell. "I activate-!"
11211121.title: Second verse, same as first.

112111212.content:
"Buster Blader's ATK is still 3100! It always was, even when Blue Eyes was destroyed! Did you forget that?" you announce.

"I play Rageki! Now it won't matter!" your opponent yells as he plays a card from his hand.

You remain steel-faced. "You're not the only one with Quick-Play Spells! Behold, De-Spell!" You play your own card.

"AH!" your foe yells in shock. He didn't see this coming?

As the BEWD fires it'' White Lighting, Buster Blader throws his sword like a throwing knife at the Dragon's head. It flies straight and true, sliptiing the Dragon's skull clean in two. Now, your opponent has only 900 Life Points.
112111212.title: Buster Blader's effect!

11211122.content:
The Mystery Man wastes no time summoning his next monster, the Wing Weaver. (atk 2750 def 2400)
Before I attack, I activate my trap card, Just Desserts. This card inflicts 500 points of direct damage to your life points for every monster you have on the field. And since you have two, that is 1000 life points. Next I activate spark which will inflict another 200 points of direct damage. Finally I will attack your Buster Blader with the Wing Weaver.
You begin to panic. Not only did you just lose one of your best monsters, you also lost a total of 1350 life points which gives him the lead, 1000 to 650. You need a miracle. You reach out a trembling hand and draw...
11211122.title: the Wing Weaver

choices: The man disappears with the use of a new millenium item
112111222.content:
You look down and see that you have drawn your favorite card, the Dark Magician. This card has pulled you out of difficult situations before and you have confidence that this will be no different. You slowly begin to formulate a plan in your head. *I have an idea,* you tell Yami. You tell him the plan and he agrees. "First I summon my Dark Magician to the field," you say. Then I activate my magic card, Monster Reborn to bring back the Buster Blader. Next I will use polymerization to fuse my magician and the Blader together to make the Dark Paladin." You then activate a card that allows you to attack the same turn that you summoned a fusion monster and you destroy the Wing Weaver with the Dark Paladin.
"Now that you have no monsters on the field, I can attack your life points directly. Curse of Dragon go!" The dragon emits its powerful blast once more to wipe out the Mystery Man's remaining life points.
He falls to his knees, defeated.
112111222.title: The DARK PAlADIN

choices: See what other moves you can make.
112112.content:
"I'll set one monster face down in defense mode, as well as this card face down," the stranger says in a confident voice. "It's your move...Pharaoh."

You draw the top card of your deck and see your Dark Magician. You don't want to use him just yet, though, so you play it safe and summon Curse of Dragon.

"I play Curse of Dragon in attack mode! Now my dragon, attack his face down monster!"

Curse of Dragon attacks and destroys Garoozis. After the attack, there's not much else you can do, so you end your turn.

"I play Goblin Attack Force (2300/0) in attack mode and I'll attack your dragon!"

The goblins appear on the field, destroy your dragon and lower your lifepoints to 1700. After the attack, the goblins are put into defense mode and the stranger ends his turn. You draw your next card and...
112112.title: Dueling the Stranger

1121122.content:
Aside from your ever faithful companion, Dark Magician, you have Mirror Wall, Pot of Greed, Alpha the Magnet Warrior............and Alpha the Electromagnetic Warrior?

*Where'd that card come from?* you think as you look at it. Yugi has the answer. {I...fiddled with the deck. I've been trying to update our cards, to not fall behind.}
*Where'd you even get this card?*
{.....Grandpa.}
*...I'll ask later. Right now, I have to make a choice.* you reply. The duel isn't over yet....
1121122.title: See what other moves you can make.

11212.content: The Man lays another monster face down with another magic/trap face down. Next you draw the Pot of Greed, a newly added card in your deck. Your draw a Polymerization and the Beta the Magna Warrior.

choices: Summon Gaia and attack Earl of Demise
Use Polymerization and summon Gaia the Dragon Champion
112121.content:
Beta destroys Mystic Horseman but then he plays a trap card, Michizuri and destroys Mystical Elf. The creep draws his card and sets it in his Magic/Trap zone. Next he summons Earl of Demise (ATK 2000/DEF 700) and destroys Beta.

Ha Ha Ha this is the great Pharoh my master warned me about?

I'm not finished yet.

You draw your card and it is Gaia the Fierce Knight.
112121.title: A Small Break on a Bad Start

113.content:
Yugi followed his gut instinct and continued down the center street. After following a few twists and turns, he ended up in front of a small building, and watched persons wrapped in black cloaks make their way inside, each cloak bearing the Millenium Symbol.
"Yugi." The Puzzle's spirit said to Yugi. "I sense a powerful Millenium Item inside that building..."
113.title: Hoooo boy...

1131.content:
"We've gotta go in." Yugi said to his spirit. "I mean, who knows what we might find?"
"Alright, but we have to get in without being noticed..." the Spirit responded.
"I've got an idea!" Yugi said...

A few moments later...

Yami Yugi watched as the line dwindled down and a lone person made his way towards the doorway. Checking to make sure no one else was there, he jumped out from behind the wall.
"Mind Crush!!" Yami yelled, pointing at the person.
The man fell down, stunned. Yami, quickly scouting the area, dragged the man into an alley, pulled his cloak off, and slung it around his own shoulders.
1131.title: Into the Frying Pan...

choices: Follow the crowd and go right...
11311.content: Wrapped in the cloak, Yugi ran up behind the other persons and followed closely behind. After several twists and turns, the line turned right and continued down the hallway. Yugi then noticed another hallway going left.
11311.title: Well, well...Another direction decision...

choices: "I'm sorry, it must have slipped my mind."
113111.content:
Deciding to play it safe for now, Yugi followed the group down the corridor, Yami waiting and watching. The group suddeny emerged into a large room, with Egyptian symbols carved on every wall, and a holographic dueling arena in the center of the room. A figure rose above the rest, standing on a pedestal above the dueling arena.
The group filed in, and formed a few lines facing the figure. They then fell to their knees, and began bowing to the person. Startled at first, Yugi began to follow their lead.

Too late.

"You there!!!" Yugi heard a voice ring out. Yugi raised his head and saw the cloaked figure staring directly at him.

"Why did you claim the Millenium Puzzle from that annoying child and not immediately bring it to me?"

Thinking fast, Yugi replied...
113111.title: Out of the Frying Pan...

choices: Play a magic or trap card.
1131112.content:
You state that you own the Millenium Puzzle, forgetting that you are trying to remain secret. Too late now, the cloaked being knows exactly who you are, and now you realize who he is as he takes his cloak off...its Marik!

"Yugi Moto, the bearer of the Millenium Puzzle. You come in here, to my source of power, and reveal yourself. My, my, my...what a shame...as I am in no condition to duel you at this time. However, my assistant here, is. You will duel him here and now...if you value your Millenium Puzzle, that is," Marik states loudly, laughing as he speaks.

A cloaked figure steps forward, but doesn't lower his hood. He takes out his deck and steps to the holographic dueling arena. You do the same, and prepare to duel. The Millenium Puzzle activates, the Life Points are dealt out, and the duel is about to begin!

2000 Life Points, and no tribute...these rules should work to your advantage.

You draw your hand and wait for your opponent to play his first card.

"Lord of Dragons with the Flute of Summoning Dragon! This allows me to play a dragon card of my choosing as a special summon. I choose, the Blue Eyes, White Dragon in attack mode!"

The Blue Eyes White Dragon appears in the arena, and his turn is over. Now, its your move. But you don't have any single card to counter this dragon card. What are you going to do?
1131112.title: A Duel Begins

choices: Kaiba's Turn: Plays Obelisk the Tormentor
Kaiba's Turn: Plays some other move.
11311122.content:
"First I'll play Swords of Revealing Light! It freezes your monsters on the field for 3 turns, making your dragon and any other monster you summon useless! Then I'll play Gaia the Fierce Knight in Attack Mode, as well as one card face down. Your Move."

Now it is Kaiba's turn (since no one else the the Yu-Gi-Oh TV series has a BEWD!)...it is up to you to decide what he'll do (and make it so that is seems almost hopeless, since Kaiba does have a good deck...and a brain) ;)
11311122.title: Yugi's First Play, and the beginning of the en

113111222.content:
"I'll summon Battle Ox, attack mode. Next, I play Remove Trap, which allows me to destroy your Swords of Revealing Lights", Kaiba announced.

Swords of Revealing Lights is destroyed.

"Battle Ox, attack Gaia the Fierce Knight", Kaiba announced.

After Gaia the Fierce Knight is destroyed, Yugi starts his turn.

Yugi plays ......
113111222.title: What to Do

choices: Make a dash for the Rod!
113112.content:
Making sure no one was coming up behind him, Yugi dashed down the left hallway. After a few twists and turns, Yugi found himself in a room, pillars every which way, walls covered by the Millenium Symbol.
"Yugi! Look!" the Spirit of the Puzzle exclaimed.
Yugi stared ahead, and saw the Millenium Rod resting on a pedestal, it's Millenium Symbol glowing in response to the Puzzle.
Yugi crept towards the Rod, making sure to be silent, when suddenly he heard footsteps approaching from somewhere.

Yugi was pretty sure he could get the Rod and hide again, but whoever was coming might notice it was gone and raise an alarm...
113112.title: Oh look!

1131121.content:
Yugi quickly decided, and dashed towards the Rod. As he lifted it from the pedestal, he barely noticed the soft click from the pressure-sesnitive pad on the pedestal. Before he could move, Yugi was caught up in a net, pulled off the ground. Surprised at first, Yugi pulled out a pocketknife and began sawing at the ropes.

The ropes began to part, and Yugi heard a malevolent chuckle from the direction of the rapidly approaching footsteps.
1131121.title: Trapped...

11311211.content:
Yugi kept cutting at the ropes, ignoring the soft chuckling.

"Oh, give it up, Yugi, even if you get out of the net, you won't get out of here with your puzzle."

Yugi finished cutting the rope under himself and fell to the ground on his back, looked up, and saw a hooded, cloaked figure.

"Who are you?" Yugi demanded.

"What? You don't recognize me?" The figure pulled his hood over his head, revealing the evil Marik.

Yugi got up and dusted himself off, still holding the rod.

"I should have known it was you, but you've made one mistake." Yugi sneered.

"And what is that?" Marik asked Yugi testily.

"This!" Yugi turned around quickly and dashed back the way he came, returning to the intersection he used before.

Heading right will take you back to the outside world, but you can bet Marik will expect you to go that way...

Going straight will take you deeper into the building, but...
11311211.title: Escape? Or maybe not...

choices: Follow Marik back into the building.
113112111.content:
Yugi skidded around the corner and ran for the outside world.

"Yami, where are we going?" Yugi asked from his soul room. "Marik will expect us to go this way, won't he?"

"Probably..." Yami replied. "But out there, we have a lot more room to manuever, and we can lose Marik more easily."

"Oh..." Yugi said as Yami ran through the door to the outside and into the sunlight.

Waiting for him were about 20 Rare Hunters, blocking off every escape route.

"Oh...no." Yami groaned as he heard footsteps from behind him.

"Thought you could escape, Pharaoh?" Yami heard the sinister voice of Marik behind him. "Follow me, please. We have things to discuss."
113112111.title: Run Away!!!

1131121111.content:
"Fine." Yami sighed. "I'll come with you...But no tricks, understand?"
"Tricks?" Marik spread his arms, showing he had nothing to hide. "I would never do that to you..."
Marik gestured to a Rare Hunter, and Yami was quickly blindfolded. A Rare Hunter on each side, Yami was quickly shuffled through hallways. Yami tried to keep track of the twists and turns, but he lost it after the 20th.

"Yami, do you know what you're doing?" Yugi asked. "Why don't we try to get away?"

"Yugi, we are currently in the grasp of two of Marik's Rare Hunters, deep in a building probably infested with more Hunters, and Marik is probably not going to be happy with our attempted escape." Yami answered. "Right now, I think it safer to go along with him."

Yugi thought about this awhile.

"We're here!" Yami heard Marik's voice say, in a sing-songy way, and Yami felt the blindfold being untied.
1131121111.title: Following Marik

11311211111.content:
"A dueling ring I should have known" Yami said after a moment of saying nothing Marik replied "yes but not just any dueling ring this ring is not a normal cards one this is a little game Ive made up called The Millenium Duel and its simple really
all you do is place your item on the triangle shaped computer system to the left of where your cards would go and your Yami, your Millenium item is like a card well in a way your spirit will be,he will be in the game with your monsters and the stronger your monster is the stronger your Millenium item will become and I bet your wondering how to start the game well all you do is take out those marbles over there on that panle, the Blue ones give you 1,000 more life points then you would normally get you know the usual 2,000 life points, the red would make you lose 1,000 points and a red and blue together will make you lose 900 points not the 1,000 you would lose from the red, the orange raises your defense by 300 and the white lets you automaticly draw your strongest card now a white and a green let you not only draw your strongest card but also lets you pick a trap our magic card of your chooseing".Yugi new why he was there to duel for his Millenium item but should he risk it after all this is the spirit Yami?
11311211111.title: The Millenium Duel

113112111111.content:
"I don't care if you made this game Marik I know I will beat you"!"Hehehehe well if your so sure Yugi then lets duel"!
DUEL!!!
....................................

"come on Marik make your move" Yugi said " "alright then" said Marik with a evil smrik on his face "go Millenium marbles"! Marik shouted out he got a orange and a green "yes now I can raise my defense by 300 points and I can pick a trap our a magic card I call out the blue eyes white dragon"!
Yugi without looking picked up two marbles "go Millenium marbles"! he yelled he got white and a green marble "yes"! Yugi yelled "I call upon the Dark Magician"! "ha that will never beat my blue eyes you fool" Marik smiled "yes but you forgot that a white and a green let you not only draw your strongest card but also lets you pick a trap our magic card" I play magical! hats magical hats con-seal the Dark Magician"! " and Marik if you choose wrong there might be a trap waiting for you"
113112111111.title: DUEL!!!

1131121112.content:
Yami ran for the nearest exit, diving over the heads of the Rare Hunters. Unfortunately for Yami, the Rare Hunters grabbed his ankles, and Yami's head slammed against the ground. Shutting away the pain, Yami tried to move, but couldn't for some reason.

"Oh no..." Marik gasped sarcastically. "It looks like you've broken your head wide open. Well, it's all good. I get the ever-evasive Millenium Puzzle-" Marik leaned down and took it from around Yami's neck, "-and I am rid of the only obstacle in my quest."

Yami's vision began to dim and blur, and Yami's last vision was of Marik laughing, his laugh echoing in Yami's ear...

(Oopsie, you've died. Thank you, come again.)
1131121112.title: Marik's Victory

choices: Leave and search for another item.
1131122.content:

"Hmm...," Marik hummed aloud. "I sense something here, an intruder!"

"Of course..." The man smiled. "My name is Alex, and I am the wielder of the Millenium Scales."
"The Millenium Scales?!?" Tea gasped.
Alex clapped a hand over Tea's mouth. "Ssshhh...." He hissed. "You must not be loud here..."
Shoving Alex's hand away from her mouth, Tea asked, "Why?"
"You'd be surprised just how many people want to get their hands on this..."
Suddenly, an alarm went off from Alex's computer.
"What's that?!" Tea asked, watching Alex tap a few keys.
141121.title: Introductions

1411212.content:
Alex brings up a live video picture on his screen,
revealing Bakura, slowly walking towards Alex's room, an evil look in his eyes.
"Who's that?" Alex asked.
"It's the spirit of the Millenim Ring!" Tea
gasped. "He wants the Millenium Items!"
Alex whipped around to face Tea. "We've got to get out of here!"
"How?" Tea asked.
Suddenly, there was a knock at the door.
1411212.title: The Arrival

choices: Tea challenges Bakura to a duel
Tea follows Alex's advice and leaves
14112121.content:
The door burst open, revealing Bakura.
"Ah..." Bakura grinned. "The Millenium Scales shall be the next addition to my collection, then."
"Who are you?" Alex asked, pulling Tea behind him.
"I'm a collector of the Millenium Items..." Bakura said, eyeing the box at Alex's hip which contained the Millenium Scale greedily. "So, hand it over and I won't hurt you."
Alex gritted his teeth. "And if I refuse?"
Bakura laughed quietly. "Then I will have to...convince you..." The Millenium Ring at his chest began to glow.
"Tea, get out of here." Alex said, motioning Tea towards the open door.
"Yes, go on, Tea..." Bakura sneered. "A useless girl like you would only get in the way..."
Tea, halfway to the door, froze, slowly turning towards Bakura.
"What...did you...call me?" Tea said angrily.
Bakura smiled. "I called you useless, Tea. Or, in addition to your other shortcomings, are you partially deaf, too?"
Tea glared at Bakura. "Why you little..."
Bakura laughed. "What, Tea? Going to challenge me?"
Tea smiled. "Sure. That's exactly what I'll do."
Bakura laughed harder. "You can't win, Tea. And if we duel, when I win, you'll be trapped in the
Shadow Realm forever!
14112121.title: Tea's Challenge

141121211.content:
Tea pulled her deck from her pocket. "Let's duel, Bakura!"
Bakura hmphed, pulling his own deck out. "Foolish girl. Your soul will increase my power even further!"
The Millenium Ring glowed, and a Duel Disk appeared on Tea's arm. Tea slid her deck into it, and the life point counter glowed.
Bakura pulled a Disk from behind his back, doing the same as Tea.
A holographic coin appeared between the duelists.
"Heads or Tails, Tea?" Bakura said as the coin flew into the air.
"Tails." Tea said.
The coin came down, spinning on the ground, finally coming to a rest on...
141121211.title: It's Time To D-d-d-d-d-duel!

141121212.content:
Tea was about to say something when she realized that he was right. She couldn't beat him in a duel. " Tea leave already!!!" she heard Alex yell again. Tea looked at him again and nodded before running out of there. She was barely halfway gone when she heard Alex screaming in pain, a flash of darkness, and she saw Yami Bakura holding the Millenium Scales as he walked out. " Well one more soul to power me even further," Yami Bakura said. Tea gasped and ran even faster.

She finally got away and ran to go and find someone...only to run into someone.

" Ah!!!" they both yelled. Tea groaned as she held her head in pain. She then heard the person trying to say something, but was smothered. " Oh I'm sorry!" Tea yelled as she got off the person. " It's okay Tea," the guy said. " Yugi!" Tea yelled (not Yami, just Yugi) as she hugged him. " Wh-What's wrong?" Yugi asked her as he full face blushed.

" Yugi that evil Bakura just took a guy's millenium item and sent him to the Shadow Realm. We have to get out of here!" Tea yelled as she stood up. Yugi quickly stood up after her. " What!" Yugi yelled. Tea saw him go into a thinking position before saying," Tea run I need to go after him," Yugi said as he started to walk in the direction Yami Bakura was at.

" But! But!" Tea started. " Tea come here," Yugi told her motioning her to come over to him. She walked over to him and Yugi told her to bend down, which she did. He took off the millenium puzzle and put it around her neck. " Wh-What are you doing?" Tea asked him.

" Just in case I lose...at least he can't get the puzzle...take care of it," Yugi said before running towards Yami Bakura. Tea watched him before yelling," Yugi! Wait!" Yugi stopped, looked over to her and yelled back," Dont follow me!" and then continued running. Tea...
141121212.title: Tea follows Alex's advice and leaves

choices: Rare Hunter sets a monster in defense mode
142.content:
The Rare Hunter spotted Tea sitting on a nearby bench.
"That is one of the Pharaoh's friends I believe. This is the perfect opportunity to exact some revenge on behalf of my master."
He walked up to the girl until he stood right in front of her. "We duel,now. In the Shadow Realm."
"What?" was all Tea got out before they were both transported.
Tea looked around in fear as dark menacing storm clouds converged overhead and lightning crackled in the background.
"Where am I?" Tea demanded.
"We are in the Shadow Realm, my dear. A place beyond your wildest nightmares. For if you lose this duel, you will be doomed to wander this endless dimension for all of eternity! We shall play by Battle City rules,4000 life points and tributes. Now I shall start this duel."
Tea willed herself to activate her duel disk and shuffled her deck. She was as ready as she was ever going to be.
142.title: A Shadow Duel

15.content:
"Not much around here to do..." Mai sighed as she walked down the street, keeping an eye out for suspicious passersby. "Might as well just sit down and watch the parade..."

Mai sat down on a nearby bench, and watched yet more people go by. Soon, her eyelids drooped, and she fell asleep.
15.title: Mai Start

151.content:
As Mai napped, a sizable crowd gathered about the parade. Mai was sleeping on a bench, a little distance from the gathering.
A man dressed entirely in black walked up behind her, and placed his hand on her shoulder, making her jump. Next he placed a knife to her back.

Mai: Oh!
Invader: I suggest you stand up... slowly.
Mai: Give me one good reason why I should listen
to a bum like you.
Invader: Because I'm the one with the knife.

Mai stood, as the man ordered.

Invader: This way! Into the woods!

She turned towards the park woods and waltzed in the midst of the trees, her assaulter holding his knife to the young woman's back.
They walked far enough away that if anything happened, Mai couldn't call or run for help... Riiiiiiiight - like she needed help.

Mai: Tell me, big boy, what were you planning on
doing with me when we reach our destination?
Invader: You'll see soon enough. I'm sure you'll
enjoy it! hehehe... sort of. I hope you
brought your deck.
Mai: I don't need my deck to deal with you.
151.title: Danger in the shadow

1511.content:
As they walked, Mai saw that the guy's hand was close to her mouth. " Hehe," Mai started chuckling. " Why are you laughing?" the guy asked. " Because of this!" Mai yelled for biting the guy's hand...hard. The guy yelled in pain as he dropped the knife. Mai grabbed the guy's arm, spun around, and let go of him...causing him to run into a bench. He moaned as he stood up and saw Mai running away. " Get back here!" The guy yelled as he gave chase.

Mai continued running. " I need to get out of here," she mumbled to himself. She turned a corner and ran into someone, causing her to fall on top of whoever it was. " Ow..." both of them moaned. She realized that she was on top of the person so she looked down and saw it was...
1511.title: Attack the man...
